title: Barshan
description: BarshanThere’s a war coming and they want blood…from my family.But that won’t stop me from protecting her.She doesn’t care who I am.The mobster.The killer.The devil with a twisted sense of justice.There’s no room for weakness in my world.No one leaves the mob unscathed.But I break rules.And I will break those who seek to hurt her.TalliI know he’s a mobster, a killer, a devil with his own twisted sense of justice.I never should have got involved with the Bratva, but I can’t help it.He sparked something inside me.Something I thought I’d forgotten.My heart.My feelings.My desires.
author: K.J. Dahlen
